billEvents.eventText: referred to corporations, authorities and commissions

title: Authorizes the dormitory authority of the state of New York to sell certain land in the county of Queens to the Indian Cultural and Community Center, Inc.
summary: Authorizes the dormitory authority of the state of New York to sell certain land in the county of Queens to the Indian Cultural and Community Center, Inc.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3324

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 24, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of A. CLARK, WEPRIN -- read once and referred to the
         Committee on Corporations, Authorities and Commissions

       AN ACT to authorize the dormitory authority of the state of New York  to
         sell  certain  land in the county of Queens to the Indian Cultural and
         Community Center, Inc.

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Notwithstanding  the  provisions  of any other law to the
    2  contrary, the dormitory authority of the state of New York is authorized
    3  to sell and convey to the Indian Cultural and Community Center, Inc. the
    4  parcel of land situated in the City of  New  York,  Borough  of  Queens,
    5  State  of  New York, constituting a portion of the Creedmoor Psychiatric
    6  Center, specifically described as follows:
    7                                  Schedule A

    8    Beginning at a point intersection of the eastern curb of Avenue  C  (S
    9  13µ22'40")  and  the  iron  fence  on  the northern boundary of OMRDD (S
   10  77µ45'49")
   11    Thence on an easterly direction along line  S  77µ45'49"E  for  243.23
   12  feet to a point
   13    Thence on a north easterly direction along line N 40µ24'14"E for 17.24
   14  feet to a point
   15    Thence  on  a  north  easterly direction along line N 40µ55'57"E 50.24
   16  feet to a point
   17    Thence on a north easterly direction along line N 34µ29'28"E for 15.43
   18  feet to a point
   19    Thence on a north easterly direction along line N 15µ35'53"E for 95.44
   20  feet to a point
   21    Thence north easterly along a curved line to the left of radius  66.19
   22  feet,  an arc distance of 30.79 feet to a point, the chord for the above
   23  described curve being N 01µ29'41"W feet,

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD06637-01-1

       A. 3324                             2

    1    Thence on a north westerly direction along line N 16µ55'29"W for 50.91
    2  feet to a point
    3    Thence on a north easterly direction along line N 49µ24'48"E for 63.02
    4  feet
    5    Thence  on  a  westerly direction along the line N 75µ09'13"W which is
    6  the same as the south face of curb of 6th St for 182.13 feet to a point
    7    Thence on a westerly direction along the line N  76µ41'36"W  which  is
    8  the  same as the south face of curb of 6th St for 105.02 feet to a point
    9  and
   10    Thence on a southerly direction along the line  13µ22'40"  for  303.50
   11  feet back to the point of beginning.

   12                                 Schedule B
   13    Beginning at a point on the southerly side of Union Turnpike, which is
   14  at  a  distance  of 233.41 feet measured along the line S84µ17'40"W from
   15  the intersection of the southerly side of Union Turnpike and the wester-
   16  ly side of 243rd St
   17    Thence on a  westerly  direction  along  the  line  S84µ17'40"  for  a
   18  distance of 50 Feet to a point
   19    Thence  on  a  southerly  direction  along  the line S05µ42'20"E for a
   20  distance of 91.71 feet to a point
   21    Thence south easterly along a curve to the left of radius of 90.0 feet
   22  (the chord of the above arc being S39µ41'25"E C=100.61') an arc distance
   23  of 106.77 feet to a point
   24    Thence on a southeasterly  direction  along  line  S73µ40'30"E  for  a
   25  distance of 52.04 feet to a point
   26    Thence  on  a  northeasterly  direction  along  line  N16µ19'30" for a
   27  distance of 50 feet to a point
   28    Thence on a  northwesterly  direction  along  line  N73µ40'30"  for  a
   29  distance of 52.04 feet to a point
   30    Thence on a northwesterly direction along a curve to the left of radi-
   31  us of 40.0 feet (the chord of the arc being N39µ41'25"W C=44.72') an arc
   32  distance of 47.45 feet
   33    Thence  on  a northwesterly direction along line N05µ42'20"W 91.15' to
   34  the point of beginning.

   35                                 Schedule C

   36    All that parcel of land lying to the east  of  the  easterly  curb  of
   37  Avenue C along line N 13µ22'40"E and
   38    Lying to the west of the westerly property line of ICCC property along
   39  line N 16µ19'30"E and
   40    Lying  to  the  north of a line drawn along the southern exterior neat
   41  face of building fourteen from easterly curb of Avenue  C  to  the  ICCC
   42  property line described above and
   43    Lying  to the south of a line, which is drawn parallel to the northern
   44  exterior neat face of building fourteen and which is  twenty  feet  away
   45  from  that  exterior  neat  face measured to the south, and which starts
   46  from the easterly curb of Avenue C described  above  (N  13µ22'40")  and
   47  ends at the ICCC property line described above (N 16µ19'30")
   48    S 2. The dormitory authority of the state of New York is authorized to
   49  fix  and determine the terms and conditions of the conveyance authorized
   50  by section one of this act, provided,  however,  that  the  sales  price
   51  shall  be  not less than the fair market value of such parcel, as deter-
   52  mined by two or more independent appraisals. Such conveyance shall  take
   53  place  within  one  year  from  the  effective date of this act; and the

       A. 3324                             3

    1  proceeds of such sale shall be deposited in the mental  hygiene  facili-
    2  ties  improvement  fund income account established pursuant to section 9
    3  of the facilities development corporation act, as added by  chapter  359
    4  of the laws of 1968.
    5    S 3. This act shall take effect immediately.
actClause: AN ACT to authorize the dormitory authority of the state of New York to sell certain land in the county of Queens to the Indian Cultural and Community Center, Inc.
